text: In philosophy of self, self-awareness is the experience of one's own personality or individualityGoogle def: Self-awareness is the ability to focus on yourself and how your actions, thoughts, or emotions do or don't align with your internal standards. If you're highly self-aware, you can objectively evaluate yourself, manage your emotions, align your behavior with your values, and understand correctly how others perceive you.May 11, 2018 However don't be confused with Consciousness in the sense of Qualia. while consciousness is being aware of one's environment and body and lifestyle, self-awareness is the recognition of that awareness. However Self-awareness is how an individual consciously knows and understands their own character, feelings, motives, and desires. == References == == Other websites == * Category:Consciousness Category:History of ideas
title: Self-awareness
